ModifyContent:
## What's Changed
* Empty collections are now hidden
* Add Remove Downloads and Permanently Delete Library Items Popup Menu Button
* Add Remove collection button
* Add Unmerge Button in Series App Bar
* Add button in selecting app bar to queue download for multiple books
* Allow merging series with series and book
* Add selecting app bar to series view
* Collections are now collapsible
* Polish profile UI

Bug Fixes:
* Fix collection headers going behind app bar (collections are also now collapsible)
* Fix error that pops up when deleting a book that isn't downloaded


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/BookAdapterTeam/book_adapter/compare/v0.3.0-alpha.3...v0.4.0-alpha.3
